languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс привлекает ваше внимание жестом.{/n} "Стой, {name}. Прежде чем мы двинемся дальше, я должен осмотреть этот уровень {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g}. Мы все еще не исследовали это место в мере, достаточной для моей миссии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс привлекает ваше внимание жестом.{/n} "Стой, {name}. Прежде чем мы двинемся дальше, я должен осмотреть этот уровень {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g}. Мы все еще не исследовали это место в мере, достаточной для моей миссии".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс привлекает ваше внимание жестом.{/n} "Стой, {name}. Прежде чем мы двинемся дальше, я должен осмотреть этот уровень {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}мануфакторума{/g}. Мы все еще не исследовали это место в мере, достаточной для моей миссии".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the manufactorum. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the manufactorum. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希对你做了个手势，引起了你的注意。{/n}“停一下，{name}。在进一步行动之前，我必须先调查{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}的这一层。就我的任务而言，我们还没有充分检查过这个区域。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希对你做了个手势，引起了你的注意。{/n}“停一下，{name}。在进一步行动之前，我必须先调查{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}制造工厂{/g}的这一层。就我的任务而言，我们还没有充分检查过这个区域。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te llama con un gesto.{/n} «Alto, {name}. Antes de seguir avanzando, debo investigar este nivel del {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Aún no hemos registrado la zona de forma suficientemente concienzuda para mi misión».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te llama con un gesto.{/n} «Alto, {name}. Antes de seguir avanzando, debo investigar este nivel del {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. Aún no hemos registrado la zona de forma suficientemente concienzuda para mi misión».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスが身振りで注意を促す。{/n}「止まってください、{name}さん。これ以上先へ進む前に、我は{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}のこのレベルを調査しなければなりません。我の任務の目的を果たすには、まだこのエリアを十分に調査できていないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスが身振りで注意を促す。{/n}「止まってください、{name}さん。これ以上先へ進む前に、我は{g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}聖工場{/g}のこのレベルを調査しなければなりません。我の任務の目的を果たすには、まだこのエリアを十分に調査できていないのです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix gestikuliert, um deine Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen.{/n} "Halt, {name}! Bevor wir weitergehen, muss ich diese Ebene des {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorums{/g} untersuchen. Wir haben uns im Rahmen meiner Mission noch nicht ausreichend mit diesem Bereich beschäftigt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix gestikuliert, um deine Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen.{/n} "Halt, {name}! Bevor wir weitergehen, muss ich diese Ebene des {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}Manufactorums{/g} untersuchen. Wir haben uns im Rahmen meiner Mission noch nicht ausreichend mit diesem Bereich beschäftigt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fait un geste pour attirer votre attention.{/n} « Un instant, {name}. Avant d'aller plus loin, je dois passer ce niveau du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} au peigne fin. Nous n'avons pas inspecté les lieux aussi minutieusement que ma mission l'exige. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fait un geste pour attirer votre attention.{/n} « Un instant, {name}. Avant d'aller plus loin, je dois passer ce niveau du {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g} au peigne fin. Nous n'avons pas inspecté les lieux aussi minutieusement que ma mission l'exige. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, dikkatini çekmek için bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "{name}, dur. İlerlemeden önce {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorumun{/g} bu seviyesini araştırmalıyım. Bu bölgeyi henüz vazifemin gereğini yerine getirecek kadar inceleyemedik."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gestures for your attention.{/n} "Stop, {name}. Before we go further, I must investigate this level of the {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufactorum{/g}. We have not yet examined this area sufficiently thoroughly for the purposes of my mission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, dikkatini çekmek için bir hareket yapıyor.{/n} "{name}, dur. İlerlemeden önce {g|Encyclopedia:Manufactorum}manufaktorum{/g}un bu seviyesini araştırmalıyım. Bu bölgeyi henüz vazifemin gereğini yerine getirecek kadar inceleyemedik."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
